roleset.name: find value of, again
roleset.note: REAPPRAISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reappraise' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from reappraise.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive, active
example.text: The mood changed after dealers reappraised the direct impact of the disaster on shares and Wall Street rebounded from early losses.
example.arg: the direct impact of the disaster on shares

example.name: transitive, passive
example.text: However, he added that [that estimate, made before extensive development drilling,]-1 currently is being reappraised *trace*-1.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: For example, [long-standing ADHD-related Stressors]-1 might be reappraised *trace*-1 as more or less stressful in the context of a new Stressor
example.arg: in the context of a new Stressor
